title: Seven Deadly Sins
description: If you enjoyed Agatha Christie’s "And Then There Were None", you will love this unputdownable thriller.Seven highly prominent people in New York City receive an anonymous letter announcing their deaths due to having committed one of the seven deadly sins of Dante's "Divine Comedy".The Seven Deadly Sins are: Pride, Envy, Wrath, Sloth, Greed, Gluttony, and Lust.They all assumed it was a harmless prank.When the New York Police Department (NYPD) realizes that murders are actually occurring, panic mounts.The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) finally tracks down the unknown serial killer, but he vanishes without a trace while surrounded by the police on Liberty Island.Seven years later, a construction worker on Liberty Island discovers a metal box that leaves the FBI and NYPD in awe.Book cover by multi-award-winning designer Juan Padrón.Vitor M. C. Rodrigues is a member of the International Thriller Writers Organization.
author: Vitor M.C. Rodrigues
